pages.name: Ritual of Magnetism
pages.text: Use a $(l:bloodmagic:rituals/ritual_diviner)Ritual Diviner$(/l) for easier construction.
Pulls up ores from the ground below and puts them into its placement range.$(br2)$(air)Air Runes: 4$(br)$(fire)Fire Runes: 4$(br)$(earth)Earth Runes: 8$(br2)$()Total Runes: 16

By default, the $()Ritual of Magnetism$() searches down to bedrock in a radius of 3 blocks out from the $(item)Master Ritual Stone$() for ores to collect. This can be augmented by placing an expensive block directly underneath the MRS, as follows: $(br2)$(li)$(item)Block of Iron$() - 7 blocks. $(li)$(item)Block of Gold$() - 15 blocks. $(li)$(item)Block of Diamond$() - 31 blocks.

pages.title: Range
pages.text: (Placement) The range that the ritual will place the grabbed ores into. $(br) $(li)Maximum Volume: 50 $(li)Horizontal Radius: 4 $(li)Vertical Radius: 4
